snippet: The contract extension, which comes just 18 months after his last extension, will keep Mr. Baier on the channel through the 2016 presidential election season.
abstract: The contract extension, which comes just 18 months after his last extension, will keep Mr. Baier on the channel through the 2016 presidential election season.

headline.main: Fox News Extends Contract of Bret Baier, Political News Anchor
